Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization

Visualization package of ELKI.

See: Description


  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VisualizationItem
    Currently an empty interface for visualization items, that serves the purpose of improving type safety.
    VisualizationListener
    Listener for visualization events.
    VisualizationMenuAction
    Visualizer actions.
    VisualizationMenuToggle
    Toggle action.
    VisualizationProcessor
    Visualization processor
    VisualizationTree.Handler1<A>
    Handler for a single result.
    VisualizationTree.Handler2<A,B>
    Handler for two result.
    VisualizationTree.Handler3<A,B,C>
    Handler for three result.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExportVisualizations
    Class that automatically generates all visualizations and exports them into SVG files.
    ExportVisualizations.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    VisualizationTask
    Container class, with ugly casts to reduce generics crazyness.
    VisualizationTree
    Tree - actually a forest - to manage visualizations.
    VisualizerContext
    Map to store context information for the visualizer.
    VisualizerParameterizer
    Utility class to determine the visualizers for a result class.
    VisualizerParameterizer.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization Description

Visualization package of ELKI.
